select count(*) from nav_brand where 1=1
and nav_sid = #{navSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT max(p.seq) from nav_brand p where 1=1
and nav_sid=#{navSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
from nav_brand
nav_sid = #{navSid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
order by seq asc
